SITE_URL.description: Base URL of the site. Has to be https://{app-name}.herokuapp.com.

CELERY_ALWAYS_EAGER.description: Controls whether asynchronous tasks (mainly used during sync) are sent to Celery or executed immediately and synchronously. Set this to ``False`` on production.

DJANGO_DEBUG.description: Controls ``DEBUG`` mode for the site. Should be set to `False` in production.

DJANGO_DEV.description: Signifies whether this is a development server or not. Should be `False` in production. Adds some additional django apps that can be helpful during day to day development.

SECRET_KEY.description: Secret key used for sessions, cryptographic signing, etc.

DISABLE_COLLECTSTATIC.description: Disables running ``./manage.py collectstatic`` during the build. Should be set to ``1``.

SSH_KEY.description: SSH private key to use for authentication when Pontoon connects to VCS servers via SSH.

SSH_CONFIG.description: Contents of the ``~/.ssh/config`` file used when Pontoon connects to VCS servers via SSH. Used for disabling strict key checking and setting the default user for SSH.

NEW_RELIC_API_KEY.description: API key for accessing the New Relic REST API. Used to mark deploys on New Relic.

NEW_RELIC_APP_NAME.description: Name to give to this app on New Relic. Required if you're using New Relic.

STATIC_HOST.description: Hostname to prepend to static resources paths. Useful for serving static files from a CDN.

SVN_LD_LIBRARY_PATH.description: Path to prepend to ``LD_LIBRARY_PATH`` when running SVN. This is necessary on Heroku because the Python buildpack alters the path in a way that breaks the built-in SVN command.

TZ.description: Timezone for the dynos that will run the app. Pontoon operates in UTC

HEROKU_DEMO.description: Enabled features like a standalone login page etc.
